skills.name: Bombardment
skills.description: Orders the ship to fire a bombardment of 3 rounds to attack random targets. Each hit has a 75% chance of stunning the enemy for 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Full Speed Ahead
skills.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 50% each, and reduces the cool time of their skills by 1 turn each.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Reduce Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Reduces cool down counter of skills by 1 or more
